channel.title: Opinions on staff?
channel.description:
Well evidently the current server players aren't happy with the way reports are dealt, or at least how long it takes.
I personally think that it's not that bad, and most of them are just complaining for the sake of it, but I still don't think it should be ignored completely. So I've made this topic out of the public domain to discuss what everyone else's opinions on the operations and ways this staff team works.
So what do you think? What would you do to answer these peoples "problems"? Do you think there is an issue at all?
I'm curious to see, I really am :|

item.title: Opinions on staff?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Davidi2:

They want to suggest that we need more moderators in the hopes that they will get picked themselves. Simple as that. There is no problem besides the plugin.

I tend to agree, as it looks like reports are getting done in under a day most of the time, which is plenty fast enough.

Hawk seems to log every block, but the /hawk tool command does sometimes break (though it isn’t server-wide, just per-player). Hopefully that will be fixed in a new version.
